titleStmt.title: A line of time revealed There is a God in Heaven that revealeth secrets, Dan.2.28. and Psal.25.14. By Henry Revit a lover of Sion, living at the Chequer in Bow-Lane with Mr. Barnes.
titleStmt.author: Revit, Henry.
